descriptionSet.description: On the back of this postcard, we see a of the content in the front as well as address details of the publisher.

inscription.text: Ravi ART Series P.S. Joshi, Art Publishers, 182 Kali adevi Rd., Bombay. Radha Madhav Radha sitting on a stone in a Madhoovana is very eager to embrace her love who, coming from behind, is aporting with her by closing her eyes with his hands.

location.name: Delhi / The Priya Paul Collection of Popular Art
Delhi / The Priya Paul Collection of Popular Art

rights.text: Copyrighted. Copyright with the original artists and publishers.

titleSet.title: Back of Postcard with english caption, "Radha Madhav"
